icebreakers.prompt: Ayaan, you've been a Research Assistant at UROP and a Teaching Assistant at Stanford. How do these roles complement each other and shape your career in software engineering?
With your extensive experience in computer software engineering and participation in the Harvard Model United Nations, what parallels do you draw between software development and diplomatic strategy?
In your experience at Kamco Invest, you worked on financial modeling and M&A. How do you see AI influencing these areas in the future?
You've been involved in hackathons with notable achievements. What is the most exciting project you've worked on during these events, and what did you learn from it?
As a recipient of multiple swimming medals, how has your experience as a competitive swimmer influenced your approach to challenges in both your academic and professional life?
